metadata.title: CVE-2019-17340 on Ubuntu 20.04 ESM (focal) - medium
metadata.description:
An issue was discovered in Xen through 4.11.x allowing x86 guest OS usersto cause a denial of service or gain privileges because grant-tabletransfer requests are mishandled.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-17340` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libxen-4.9 - 4.11.1+92-g6c33308a8d-1
libxenstore3.0 - 4.11.1+92-g6c33308a8d-1
xen-hypervisor-4.6-amd64 - 4.11.1+92-g6c33308a8d-1
xen-hypervisor-4.6-arm64 - 4.11.1+92-g6c33308a8d-1
xen-hypervisor-4.6-armhf - 4.11.1+92-g6c33308a8d-1
xen-hypervisor-4.7-amd64 - 4.11.1+92-g6c33308a8d-1
xen-hypervisor-4.7-arm64 - 4.11.1+92-g6c33308a8d-1
xen-hypervisor-4.7-armhf - 4.11.1+92-g6c33308a8d-1
xen-hypervisor-4.8-amd64 - 4.11.1+92-g6c33308a8d-1
xen-hypervisor-4.8-arm64 - 4.11.1+92-g6c33308a8d-1
xen-hypervisor-4.8-armhf - 4.11.1+92-g6c33308a8d-1
xen-hypervisor-4.9-amd64 - 4.11.1+92-g6c33308a8d-1
xen-hypervisor-4.9-arm64 - 4.11.1+92-g6c33308a8d-1
xen-hypervisor-4.9-armhf - 4.11.1+92-g6c33308a8d-1
xen-system-amd64 - 4.11.1+92-g6c33308a8d-1
xen-system-arm64 - 4.11.1+92-g6c33308a8d-1
xen-system-armhf - 4.11.1+92-g6c33308a8d-1
xen-utils-4.9 - 4.11.1+92-g6c33308a8d-1
xen-utils-common - 4.11.1+92-g6c33308a8d-1
xenstore-utils - 4.11.1+92-g6c33308a8d-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: xen package in focal, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '4.11.1+92-g6c33308a8d-1').
